definition: to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: From the Chilean capital of Santiago, the epicenter about 590 km.
sentences.chinese: 震中距智利首都聖地亞哥市約590公里。

sentences.english: Potential sources are the aggregates of probable epicenters in the future.
sentences.chinese: 潛在震源區是未來可能的震中集合體。

sentences.english: These wells should provide data related to possible pre-seismic, co-seismic, or post-seismic water level fluctuations.
sentences.chinese: 這些井可提供震前，震中或震後水位升降的資料。

sentences.english: The epicenter was 56 km from Christchurch.
sentences.chinese: 震中距克賴斯特徹奇市56公里。

sentences.english: The seismicity is statistically relative to the level of water of the reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 小震羣的震中分佈與安寧河東支斷裂和庫水位有關。

sentences.english: The epicenter was 98km southwest of the town of Pasni.
sentences.chinese: 震中在伯斯尼城西南98km的位置。

sentences.english: From all around the dam area, Chinese soldiers are launching their assault on the epicentre .
sentences.chinese: 從大壩臨近的地區，中國的士兵們向震中發起了總攻。

sentences.english: Its epicentre was about 130km off Japan's east coast.
sentences.chinese: 地震震中距離日本東部海岸大約130千米。

sentences.english: Uh Dam is located about 1.0km (0.6 miles) from the earthquake epicenter.
sentences.chinese: 烏赫大壩距震中大約1公里。

sentences.english: Roads to Wenchuan Conuty, epicenter of the quake, were blocked by fallen rocks and debris.
sentences.chinese: 通往震中汶川的道路被震落的碎石堵住了。

sentences.english: This information is much more valuable than merely pinpointing the quake epicenter.
sentences.chinese: 這一信息比僅僅確定震中的位置要有價值得多。

sentences.english: In Zhenzhong Qu, longitudinal wave to the ground moving from top to bottom Britain.
sentences.chinese: 在震中區，縱波使地面上下顛動。

sentences.english: In the far field earthquake, the energy of the Rayleigh Waves is dominante.
sentences.chinese: 遠場地震中，瑞利波能量是佔優的。

sentences.english: These facts show that before the earthquakes, deformations of the earth crust in the epicentral regions had already occurred.
sentences.chinese: 這些事實說明了大地震發生前震中區的地層已有變形。

sentences.english: The main force of the earthquake was felt 17 kilometres south-west of the Haitian capital, Port-au-Prince.
sentences.chinese: 地震震中位於海地首都太子港西南17公里處。

sentences.english: He is from the city of Mianyang in Sichuan, northeast of the earthquake’s epicenter.
sentences.chinese: 他來自四川省的綿陽市，位於地震震中的東北方向。

definition: powerful earthquake/abbr. for 強烈地震|强烈地震
shallow earthquake (with epicenter less than 70 km deep)
earthquake intensity (measure of its destructive power)
Zeku county in Huangnan Tibetan autonomous prefecture 黃南藏族自治州|黄南藏族自治州[Huang2 nan2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
